title: Understanding the Move Virtual Machine
description: Explore the Move Virtual Machine (MoveVM), the execution engine that powers the Aptos blockchain, enabling secure and efficient smart contract execution through its unique resource-oriented programming model.

tasks.title: Prepare for Learning
tasks.description: Add at least 0.05 APT to your wallet to begin exploring the Move Virtual Machine

tasks.title: MoveVM Basics
tasks.description: Understand what the Move Virtual Machine is
tasks.question: What is the Move Virtual Machine (MoveVM)?
options: A physical hardware device
A cross-chain bridge
The execution engine that runs smart contracts on Aptos
A wallet application
tasks.correctAnswer: The execution engine that runs smart contracts on Aptos

tasks.title: Resource-Oriented Programming
tasks.description: Learn about Move's key programming paradigm
tasks.question: What is 'resource-oriented programming' in Move?
options: Programming that focuses on memory optimization
A paradigm where digital assets are represented as resources that cannot be copied or implicitly destroyed
Programming that uses minimal CPU resources
A way to organize code into libraries
tasks.correctAnswer: A paradigm where digital assets are represented as resources that cannot be copied or implicitly destroyed

tasks.title: Move Modules
tasks.description: Understanding the structure of Move code
tasks.question: What is a module in the context of Move programming?
options: Only a collection of functions
A UI component for dApps
A container for code that defines struct types and functions that operate on these types
A third-party library
tasks.correctAnswer: A container for code that defines struct types and functions that operate on these types

tasks.title: Type Safety
tasks.question: How does the MoveVM ensure type safety?
options: It doesn't check types at all
Through dynamic typing at runtime only
Through static type checking and bytecode verification
Only by manual code review
tasks.correctAnswer: Through static type checking and bytecode verification

tasks.title: Gas Model
tasks.question: How does the Aptos MoveVM handle transaction execution costs?
options: All transactions are free
Through a gas model where computational steps cost gas units
With a fixed fee per transaction regardless of complexity
By charging only the sender, not the contract
tasks.correctAnswer: Through a gas model where computational steps cost gas units

tasks.title: Formal Verification
tasks.description: Learn about Move's approach to code correctness
tasks.question: What is formal verification in the context of Move?
options: Manual testing of smart contracts
Having multiple developers review code
Mathematical proofs that code behaves as expected
Deploying to testnet before mainnet
tasks.correctAnswer: Mathematical proofs that code behaves as expected

tasks.title: MoveVM vs EVM
tasks.question: How does the Move VM differ from Ethereum's EVM?
options: They are identical in design
MoveVM is faster but less secure
MoveVM has resource-oriented programming and stronger type safety
MoveVM can only handle simple transactions
tasks.correctAnswer: MoveVM has resource-oriented programming and stronger type safety

tasks.title: Execution Model
tasks.question: How does the MoveVM execute transactions?
options: One at a time in sequence
Using a parallel execution engine with Block-STM for parallelization
By randomly selecting transactions
Only in batches at the end of the day
tasks.correctAnswer: Using a parallel execution engine with Block-STM for parallelization

tasks.title: Ability System
tasks.question: What is the 'ability' system in Move?
options: A ranking system for developers
A way to grant permissions to users
A type annotation system that controls what operations can be performed on values
A system for measuring computational power
tasks.correctAnswer: A type annotation system that controls what operations can be performed on values

tasks.title: Storage Model
tasks.description: Learn how data is stored in MoveVM
tasks.question: How is data stored in the Aptos implementation of MoveVM?
options: Only in temporary memory
In a SQL database off-chain
In a hierarchical structure under accounts in global storage
Only in JSON format
tasks.correctAnswer: In a hierarchical structure under accounts in global storage

tasks.title: Standard Library
tasks.question: What does the Move standard library provide?
options: Only basic arithmetic functions
Core data structures, crypto operations, and blockchain-specific functionality
Only external API connections
Nothing, all functions must be custom built
tasks.correctAnswer: Core data structures, crypto operations, and blockchain-specific functionality
